events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit me well and I would like a refund.
The support system has categorized this case as a refund request following the customer's return inquiry.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the incompatible jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return to help us process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 567890123. The jacket is too small despite checking the size chart before ordering.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 30 days, and we will issue a full refund once we receive the item.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I'll send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have noted your return request. Once we receive your jacket, the refund will be processed promptly. Feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance.
We wanted to check if you have returned the jacket and if everything went smoothly with your refund process.
Yes, I returned it last week and I have already received the refund. Thanks for the excellent support!
We are glad to hear your refund was received successfully. We are closing this case now, thank you for being our customer.
Please take a moment to complete our short survey about your recent refund experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
